sentences.cn: 被改编成电视剧的小说

sentences.en: And so we've come here today to dramatize a shameful condition.
sentences.cn: 所以,我们今天来到这里,要把这骇人听闻的情况公诸于众.

sentences.en: Don't believe everything she tells you; she tends to dramatize.
sentences.cn: 她的话不可尽信; 她往往言过其实.

sentences.en: Don't dramatize -- just give us the facts!
sentences.cn: 别弄花 巧 了只管说出事实经过吧!

sentences.en: Don't dramatize so much, just give us the facts.
sentences.cn: 不要过于渲染，告诉我们实情就行了。
别夸大其词地诉说你的问题了.

sentences.en: Don't worry too much about what she said—she tends to dramatize things.
sentences.cn: 别太在意她说的话—她往往言过其实。

sentences.en: He intended his novel to dramatize the conflict between heresy and Christianity.
sentences.cn: 他打算在他的小说里戏剧化地再现异教与基督教之间的冲突.

sentences.en: Often, well - worded speech can dramatize the situation far better.
sentences.cn: 一篇动听的演说词往往更加能引起人们对形势的注意.

sentences.en: So we have come here today to dramatize the shameful condition.
sentences.cn: 所以,我们今天到这里来,把这骇人听闻的事实公诸于众.
那个事件很具有戏剧性.

sentences.en: They have a tendency to show off, to dramatize almost every situation.
sentences.cn: 他们爱炫耀，几乎对每种情况都添油加醋。
这部小说可改编得很好.

sentences.en: To dramatize the necessity of clandestine warfare, instructors objectively recited case histories and their import.
sentences.cn: 为了说明秘密战的必要性, 教官们客观地讲述了案例及其意义.

sentences.en: We have come here today to dramatize a shameful condition.
sentences.cn: 今天我们来到这里,生动有力地揭露出这种可耻的局面.
